description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Shoot paint balls at your opponent and make a splash. Take fun to the next level across roads, parks, rail roads and so on. Stealth, blobs, turrets, teleport and cars make this a fun splashing adventure. May the best player win!
description.short: Shoot paint balls at your opponent and make a splash. Take fun to the next level across roads, parks, rail roads and so on. Stealth, blobs, turrets, teleport and cars make this a fun splashing adventure. May the best player win!
